titles.title: Campaign Accountability Act of 2007
To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to repeal the limitation on party expenditures on behalf of candidates in general elections.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 10/10/2007--Introduced. Campaign Accountability Act of 2007 - Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to repeal the limitation on party expenditures on behalf of candidates in general elections.
